# useSubscription() function

React hook. Allows to subscribe to [VirtualScrollerEvent](./virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent.md) without unnecessary rerenders.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useSubscription: (model: VirtualScroller, events: readonly VirtualScrollerEvent[] | VirtualScrollerEvent[], callBack: () => void) => void
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td><td>

[VirtualScroller](./virtual-core.virtualscroller.md)


</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

events


</td><td>

readonly [VirtualScrollerEvent](./virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| [VirtualScrollerEvent](./virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

array of [VirtualScrollerEvent](./virtual-core.virtualscrollerevent.md) to subscribe


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

callBack


</td><td>

() =&gt; void


</td><td>

callback to be called


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

For example can be used in load-on-demand.
